mdRecord.dcterms:title: Bar-Le-Duc
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dépôt de la guerre (France)
France. Corps d'état-major.
United States. Army. Corps of Engineers. Regiment, 29th.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Printed at Base Printing Plant, 29th Engineers, U.S. Army
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 53 x 83 cm. on sheet 61 x 86 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Relief shown by hachures and spot heights.

Reprint of the Bar-Le-Duc sector (Sheet 51) of a topographic map of France. Original publication details printed in lower margin: "Levée par les Officiers du Corps d'Etat-Major et publiée par le Dépôt de la Guerre in 1838. Revisée en 1911. Gravée: le trait par Boclet, la lettre par Hacq, le figure du terrain par Blacher". Names of the connecting sheets printed in margins.
Sheet number "51" printed in upper right margin. Includes index to adjoining sheets and compilation diagram.
Map covers the area from Lignieres on the east to Loisy sur Marne in the west, then north to Somme-Suippo in the west and Lempire in the east.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--France--Maps, Topographic.
